MARKUP_FONT - Static variable in interface jhelp.gui.serializer.Constants
Main markup for describe a font: family : Font family size : Font size bold : Indicates if its bold (false by default) italic : Indicates if its italic (false by default) underline : Indicates if its underline (false by default)
MARKUP_FRAME - Static variable in interface jhelp.gui.xml.Constants
Markup for describe the main frame name : Name of the class (With the package name) [Mandatory] title : Frame title [Optional] layout : Layout class to use in {Constants.JHelpBorderLayout (Default value), Constants.JHelpHorizontalLayout, Constants.JHelpVerticalLayout, Constants.JHelpTableLayout} [Optional]
MARKUP_GRADIENT - Static variable in interface jhelp.gui.serializer.Constants
Main markup for describe a list of a gradient: upLeft : Up left color upRight : Up right color downLeft : Down left color downRight : Down right color
MARKUP_GRADIENT_HORIZONTAL - Static variable in interface jhelp.gui.serializer.Constants
Main markup for describe a gradient horizontal.It have Percent (Constants.MARKUP_PERCENT) as children
MARKUP_GRADIENT_VERTICAL - Static variable in interface jhelp.gui.serializer.Constants
Main markup for describe a gradient vertical.It have Percent (Constants.MARKUP_PERCENT) as children
MARKUP_PERCENT - Static variable in interface jhelp.gui.serializer.Constants
